attributes.title: heart ❤️been broke 💔 so many times ⏰ i i don’t 🤷‍♀️know what to believe 💭 yeah 👍
attributes.review: No❤️ I wanted to download this app for the infamous orange peel. As I scrolled through this 𝓼𝓲𝓵𝓵𝔂 app MY DOG RAN AWAY FROM HOME, MY MOM JUMPED OFF THE ROOF AND MY GRANDMA DISOWNED ME!! I refuse to believe this app didn’t have something to do with it. ✨𝓯**𝓴 𝓽𝓻𝓾𝓹✨ ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨eye👁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆.

attributes.title: Glitched
attributes.review: This app needs to be worked on! After taking forever to download, I clicked on the app and it was glitched. It wouldn’t even let me open the dang app! I could open other apps just fine. Must need a software update or something..🧡

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Don’t even bother getting this app, it takes forever to download, it is so slow even when I am on WiFi, the app dosent work properly, it always boots me out of the app, if you are seeing this DONT GET THIS APP. It is a waste of time. Thank you for reading this review

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is by far one of the most Chinese looking things out there and it’s honestly disappointing know that Trump absolutely hates Chinese people and is a complete racist anyways long story short don’t get the app he wants to ban so let’s take down his app as well

attributes.title: Too much personal info to give
attributes.review: This app reads your data and gives it to who knows what. Now I'm getting spam telemarketing calls and email. I've lost faith in Trump. I downloaded this to get more hope for him but now I cannot. I will not be voting.

attributes.title: Sudden cause of death
attributes.review: My grandmother and my sister loved our president they worshiped him do you notice I’m using past tense well that’s because after looking at trump 2020 they died my sister is allergic to oranges and maybe that was why but like they’re dead and I want a refund

attributes.title: Gen z do be savin tik tok
attributes.review: This app caused multiple problems. First, there are now ants in my soup. ANTS. I don’t recommend downloading. If that isn’t enough for you, President Frumpy is supporting racism, homophobia, and many others horrible things. why vote for that. This is a serious issue. but guys. ANTS IN MY SOUP. 0/10 rating in my opinion.

attributes.title: Very boring app
attributes.review: This app is extremely boring. Not to mention how the screen goes black and kicks you out of the app at random times. It’s a waste of storage on your phone. Definitely not worth the storage or the time. Highly discouraged.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app made my iPad shut off and completely reset my apps so and I have to make another roblox account for the second time so I am definitely deleting this app I wanted to learn more about our president but now I am really upset and want to cry

attributes.title: Ewy
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and put in my phone number then about a day or 2 later i started getting text of sexual components such as donald trumps pp pics and it was yucky. i also got texts asking to see my toesie woesies in cat food. 0/10 don’t recommend. Trump 2020🧚‍♂️💫🌸But 6 feet under🌸💫🧚‍♂️
